name: 20 Times You
lyric:
Seems that you have lost your paper
Now you trapped in water
No need be afraid of monster
You're safe with me

People laugh and hurt your feeling
Lover dies and you're missing
But 20 times I feel,I do
Concentrate on my whisper

Come with me
I have your thing
We are one
Stay inside me

混音：陈粒
lyric_extra:
文本歌词最后由 哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈皮 编辑于2019-09-11 16:32

LRC歌词最后由 小词LyricsInfo 编辑于2019-09-11 16:32
